text: kya tu ne munaafiqo ko na dekha? ke apne ahle kitaab kaafir bhaiyyo se kehte hai, agar tum jila watan kiye gaye, to zaroor bil zaroor hum bhi tumhaare saath nikal khade honge aur tumhaare baare mein hum kabi bhi kisi ki baath na maanenge aur agar tum se jang ki jayegi to ba khuda hum tumhaari madad karenge, lekin Allah ta’ala gawaahi deta hai ke ye qat’an jhute hai
